Message.Title: Obama uses massacre of children to advance his politics
Message.Msg: Obama's actions are Disgusting! The Texas Governer Rick Perry also agrees with me. Gov. Rick Perry released the following statement regarding President Obama's executive actions: "The Vice President's committee was appointed in response to the tragedy at Newtown, but very few of his recommendations have anything to do with what happened there. "Guns require a finger to pull the trigger. The sad young man who did that in Newtown was clearly haunted by demons and no gun law could have saved the children in Sandy Hook Elementary from his terror. "There is evil prowling in the world - it shows up in our movies, video games and online fascinations, and finds its way into vulnerable hearts and minds. As a free people, let us choose what kind of people we will be. Laws, the only redoubt of secularism, will not suffice. Let us all return to our places of worship and pray for help. Above all, let us pray for our children. "In fact, the piling on by the political left, and their cohorts in the media, to use the massacre of little children to advance a pre-existing political agenda that would not have saved those children, disgusts me, personally. The second amendment to the Constitution is a basic right of free people and cannot be nor will it be abridged by the executive power of this or any other president."

Topic.Title: The President can be arrested like anyone else

Message.Msg: This excuse for a President can be legally arrested in any county by a sheriff for the numerous laws he has already broken including abuse of power, multiple incidents of contempt of court, murder of a US border agent, failure to deliver budget on time, campaign finance fraud, among many others.

Topic.Title: The President can be arrested like anyone else

Message.Msg: The Secret Service can also be arrested and charged. Any shots fired at local law enforecement will be prosecuted severely. No one is above the law.

Topic.Title: ATTENTION: 5 Reason you need to hurry to buy Now!

Message.Msg: 1. The downfall of the percentage of global internet users stopped on Nov. Most value calculation are based on Google gaining growth on Yahoo, but this is not happening anymore (21% of Global users). Yahoo does not need to increase, just need to stop the downfall, so their growth is proportional to the global growth.

Topic.Title: ATTENTION: 5 Reason you need to hurry to buy Now!

Message.Msg: 2. Attention, Nobody has mentioned this anywhere! Time on site has increased since December for more than 2 minutes. Just like in Walmart ,the longer you stay on the store, the higher the probability of buying something.

Topic.Title: ATTENTION: 5 Reason you need to hurry to buy Now!

Message.Msg: 4. Another one that nobody has mentioned! Recruiting has ramped up significantly. Go to careers on yahoo and see the posting and type of posting this is a new Start-up company. They have more than 600 posting, 4 times more than Facebook.
